user.title: Chief Inspectorate Of Environmental Protection (GIOS)
user.description:
If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/bieniu/ha-gios 

 It is recommended to use the official version of integration, go to: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/gios/

error.wrong_station_id: ID of the measuring station is not correct.
error.invalid_sensors_data: Invalid sensors' data for this measuring station.

abort.already_configured: GIOS integration for this measuring station is already configured.
